name: The Dusty Work
description:
The dusty work!

Our robot vacuum cleaner is stucked in the loop and can’t clear all floor in rooms. You need to help him get out of this loop using improvised means (fans, chests of drawers, lamps and trash cans)

HOW TO PLAY 🎮

You need to clean all floor in rooms. Robot will help you with that!

Robot vacuum cleaner is moving forward until he is doesn’t blocked. He can push small lamps and trash cans. If he is stucked he will turn left and try to go foward

You can push robot and small ogjects with fan (by clicking on it) or by using chest of drawers.
